attributes.title: To many glitches and nazis
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep up with the latest political news. The second I opened the app I was faced with the image of a HUGE nazi. This however was not the biggest issue with the app. Once in the app the amount of white supremacy was OVERWHELMING. The user interface was super glitchy and unfriendly. All the buttons were in the shape of swastikas this made learning to use the app quite difficult. The app was very obviously mining data. I Immediately began receiving adds for Trump related merchandise including but not limited to, Trump T-shirtâ€™s, Trump mugs, Trump dog accessories, Space Force Dildos (in the shape of rockets), I â¤ï¸ RUSSIA butt plugs, A whip that says â€œtough one Iranâ€, and last but not least a melt your own glacier childrenâ€™s science kit. DO NOT I REPEAT DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS HORRIFIC APP.
